text: “apagē deviyanē! oba ovunṭa porondu vana lada, sthīravū svargayanhi ovungenda, ovungē mutun mittangenda, ovungē bhāryayāvangenda, ovungē paramparāvē daruvangenda vū hon̆da ayavada ætuḷu karanu mænava! niyata vaśayenma obama (siyallanṭama) balasampannayeku hā (siyalla dannā) gnānavantayeku vaśayen siṭinnehiya”
